src:
Ministra Plá lamentó que dos alumnas del Liceo 7 resultaran heridas por perdigones de Carabineros
La autoridad indicó que se investigarán los hechos.
05 Nov 2019 by David Muñoz
La ministra de la Mujer y Equidad de Género, Isabel Plá, lamentó que dos alumnas del Liceo 7 resultaran heridas, durante las manifestaciones de esta jornada en distintos puntos del país.Recordemos que un par de estudiantes fueron víctimas de la represión de Carabineros, quienes se encontraban movilizadas al interior del recinto educacional.Al respecto, la ministra Plá expresó su posición en redes sociales, indicando que se realizarán las indagatorias respectivas."Lamentamos que dos alumnas del Liceo 7 hayan resultado hoy heridas, en un hecho que debe ser investigado ahora. Para el Gobierno, la integridad de todas las mujeres es importante y debe protegerse", expresó.
text:
Minister Plá regretted that two students of Liceo 7 were injured by gunshots of Carabineros
The authority indicated that the facts will be investigated.
05 Nov 2019 by David Muñoz
The Minister of Women and Gender Equality, Isabel Plá, lamented that two students of the Liceo 7 were injured, during the demonstrations of this day in different parts of the country.Recall that a couple of students were victims of the repression of police, who they were mobilized inside the educational premises. In this regard, Minister Plá expressed her position in social networks, indicating that the respective inquiries will be carried out. "We regret that two students of Liceo 7 have been injured today, in a fact that must be investigated now. For the Government, the integrity of all women is important and must be protected, "he said.
